item.title: Holt Renfrew
item.description: Is a chain of high-end Canadian department stores specializing in an array of luxury brands and designer boutiques.

item.title: The Bay flagship store
item.description: Hudson's Bay (formerly and still commonly known as The Bay) is a chain of 90 department stores that operate across parts of Canada. It is the main brand of Hudson's Bay Company (HBC), North America's oldest company.[

item.title: Toronto Eaton Centre
item.description: Toronto Eaton Centre is a world-class shopping destination located in the heart of the city's bustling downtown core. Millions of tourists from around the world visit the Centre for its architecture, culture and urban atmosphere.

item.title: Yorkdale Mall
item.description: Yorkdale Shopping Centre is a large shopping mall that contains over 250 stores. It is the fifth largest shopping mall in Canada.
